alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 11:57AM AKDT until July 25 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT TUESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from 1 PM Tuesday to 4 AM AKDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Central Interior today. Areas east of Tanana in the Central Interior tomorrow Tuesday. * TIMING...For the first Red Flag Warning, until 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. For the second Red Flag Warning, from 1 PM Tuesday to 4 AM AKDT Wednesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...West 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 42 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Lightning from scattered thunderstorms today and tomorrow Tuesday could lead to new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
